summary: Build a resume builder application with an AI coaching component.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimalist typographic logo mark, black/charcoal on transparent background (resume-coach-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Simple editorial-style illustration of a desk with paper and checklist, warm neutral palette (empty-state-illustration.dim_1200x800.png)

existing_features.title: Create a resume editor UI that lets users build a resume using structured sections (at minimum: Basics/Contact, Summary, Work Experience, Education, Skills) with add/edit/reorder capabilities for repeating items (e.g., multiple jobs).
Add a live resume preview view that renders the resume in a clean, print-friendly layout and supports exporting via the browser print dialog (user can save as PDF).

Implement an AI-style coaching feature that analyzes the current resume content using deterministic heuristics (no external AI services) and returns actionable suggestions categorized by section (e.g., impact, clarity, keywords, formatting consistency).
Add an application shell with navigation for: Resume List, Resume Editor/Preview, and Coaching, using React Query for all canister reads/writes and consistent loading/error states.

Define and apply a cohesive visual theme for the app (colors, typography, spacing, component styling) with a professional editorial look (avoid blue/purple as primary colors) and ensure it is used consistently across all pages.
Add generated static image assets (logo + optional hero/empty-state illustration) to the frontend and display them in the app shell/landing/empty states.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a resume builder and AI coaching app
Implement backend data models and persistence for resumes, including CRUD operations scoped to the callerâ€™s Principal (so each user only accesses their own resumes).
Persist coaching runs/results per resume so users can view the latest coaching output after refreshing the app (store at least the latest run timestamp and suggestions).
